name: Check In Easy
overview:
Check In Easy iPad/iPhone application is for simple guest registration, check-in and management at events from 2 people to 10000.

•Eliminate the need for paper guestlists, clipboards and binders •Upload a guest list and you are ready to go •Check in through web app and live sync with iPads and iPhones •VIP alerts tell you when important guests arrive •Search for guests quickly •Boarding pass feature lets you send your guests printable tickets with unique bar codes. •Quick check in using the integrated ticket scanner •Manage guest list during the event
